programme.title: Parmanu - The Story of Pokhran
programme.desc: Based on true events, Parmanu – The Story of Pokhran follows the journey of a dedicated IAS officer, Ashwat Raina, who leads a top-secret mission to conduct India’s first underground nuclear tests in 1998 at Pokhran, Rajasthan. Battling political opposition, espionage threats, and tight deadlines, the team works against all odds to place India on the world’s nuclear map. The film is a patriotic thriller about courage, strategy, and national honor.

programme.title: Aitraaz
programme.desc: Directed by Abbas Mustan, this romantic thriller stars Akshay Kumar, Priyanka Chopra, and Kareena Kapoor. The film tackles the sensitive issue of male sexual harassment, with Chopra delivering a standout performance that earned critical acclaim. Inspired by the 1994 film Disclosure, Aitraaz was both a commercial and critical success.

programme.title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: Ramaiya Vastavaiya is a romantic drama directed by Prabhu Deva. It revolves around Ram (Girish Kumar), a rich and carefree NRI, who falls in love with Sona (Shruti Haasan), a simple village girl. When he proposes marriage, her protective brother (Sonu Sood) challenges him to prove that he can live and work like a farmer before earning her hand. Set in vibrant rural India, the film blends romance, comedy, and family drama with catchy music and traditional values.

The film tackles the sensitive issue of male sexual harassment, with Chopra delivering a standout performance that earned critical acclaim. programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Karamveer Singh, a young man with an unusual ability to mimic a woman’s voice, lands a job at a friendship call center where he poses as "Pooja." His growing popularity among lonely men—including a cop, a spoiled brat, and even a local goon—spirals into chaos as they all fall in love with "Pooja," unaware of her true identity. The film is a comedy that touches on loneliness, societal pressures, and identity.

programme.title: URI - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, URI – The Surgical Strike chronicles the Indian Army’s 2016 surgical strike on terror launchpads across the Line of Control in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. Led by Major Vihaan Singh Shergill, the mission is carried out as retaliation for the deadly Uri base camp attack. With intense training, strategic execution, and nationalistic fervor, the film is a gripping military action drama showcasing courage and patriotism.
